1:
Yahweh, my heart is not proud or my eyes haughty.\q I do not have great hopes for myself
\q or concern myself with things that are beyond me.


\q
2:
Indeed I have stilled and quieted my soul;\q like a weaned child with his mother,
\q my soul within me is like a weaned child.
\q
3: Israel, hope in Yahweh\q now and forever.
